amendment.description: Amendment modifies the instruction prohibiting price gouging by replacing it with language discouraging price gouging.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to modify the instruction prohibiting price gouging by replacing it with language discouraging price gouging.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klein (FL) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Klein (FL) to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A008).
